Description:
Performs skilled preventive maintenance tasks on medical equipment.
This equipment is connected to patients or is used to diagnose disease.  
The equipment handled includes Defibrillators, Cardiac Monitors, Infant Care Centers, Incubators, Infusion Pumps, Audiometers, Electrosurgical Units, Microscopes, Spirometers Dental Anesthesia Units, etc.  
Work is performed on equipment throughout medical facilities including Dental and district clinics.  Subject to scheduled On-Call for medical equipment emergencies.Job Details
